text.section:
Unless otherwise authorized by the county commissioners, a tip jar licensee may operate a tip jar game only:
during normal business hours; and
on the tip jar licensee's premises.
A tip jar licensee may award prizes in money or merchandise for a tip jar game.
The agency periodically shall send an agent to inspect the premises of each tip jar licensee to ensure compliance with Part III of this subtitle.
